translated: Vajra Sarasvatī Sādhana

original: rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajra Sarasvatī.

original: byi ru nor bu'i 'od can shin tu mdzes //
analyzed: byi ru nor bu'i 'od can shin tu mdzes //
translated: Extremely beautiful with the light of a coral jewel,

original: dang por rdo rje dbyangs can ma ni zhal gsum ma //
analyzed: dang por rdo rje dbyangs can ma ni zhal gsum ma //
translated: First, Vajra Sarasvatī has three faces,🔽Holding a lotus, sword, flaying knife, and white chakram,

original: padma ral gri gri gug 'khor lo dkar po dang // pi wang rin chen tshangs pa bsnams la mgos phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: padma ral gri gri gug 'khor lo dkar po dang // pi wang rin chen tshangs pa bsnams la mgos phyag 'tshal //
translated: And a veena, jewel, and Brahmā head. I bow my head to her.

original: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba'i steng du nye bar 'dug ste /
analyzed: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba'i steng du nye bar 'dug ste /
translated: In a secluded place that is pleasing to the mind, sitting on a comfortable seat,

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize oneself as the first vowel-born one on a moon disc in one's heart.

original: de'i steng du ngo:yig gi sa bon las nor bu padma r'a ga'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ngo:yig gi sa bon las nor bu padma r'a ga'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Above that, from the seed syllable of the letter ṅ, [one visualizes] a jewel equal to the light of a ruby.

original: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul te mdun du gdan drangs nas /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul te mdun du gdan drangs nas /
translated: Light rays from that invoke the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas, who are invited to the front.

original: de nas rdo rje me tog ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje me tog ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: Then make offerings with the offerings of the mantra goddesses such as Vajra Flower and so forth, which arise from the nature of mind.

original: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /🔽de nas aom sva h'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste / de nas aom sva h'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: Then confess negative actions and so forth.

original: zhes lan bdun brjod par bya'o //🔽aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: zhes lan bdun brjod par bya'o // aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Then recite Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ seven times.

original: zhes pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then meditate on all phenomena as emptiness with Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: de nas mdun du padma dmar po khru bdun gyi tshad rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mdun du padma dmar po khru bdun gyi tshad rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then visualize a seven-cubit red lotus in front.

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cung zad dmar ba aam yig las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cung zad dmar ba aam yig las byung ba'o //
translated: On top of that is a moon maṇḍala, slightly red, arisen from the letter Aṃ.

original: de'i steng du do:yig las byung ba'i chu skyes /
analyzed: de'i steng du do:yig las byung ba'i chu skyes /
translated: Upon that, a lotus arises from the letter Do.🔽Again, upon the lotus, on a moon disc, and upon that, the letter Do.

original: slar yang padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng du do:yig go / yang de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyis 'gro ba drug po yang dag par bsdus @191b nas /
analyzed: slar yang padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng du do:yig go / yang de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyis 'gro ba drug po yang dag par bsdus @191b nas /
translated: Again, a cloud of light rays arises from that, and having gathered the six classes of migrating beings,

original: sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bkod nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i rnam pas do:yig la rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bkod nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i rnam pas do:yig la rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
translated: having established the sentient beings in unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment, one should cause the form of Vajra Sarasvatī to enter into the letter Do.

original: de nas rang la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should cause it to enter oneself.

original: rang la zhugs pa tsam gyis thams cad yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha mo sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rang la zhugs pa tsam gyis thams cad yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha mo sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: By merely causing it to enter oneself, everything is completely transformed into the goddess with three faces and six arms, adorned with various ornaments,

original: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: with reddish-brown hair streaming upward,🔽standing with the left leg straight on a red moon.

original: zla ba dmar po'i steng na zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba dmar po'i steng na zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize that.

original: de'i zhal dang po ni dmar po //
analyzed: de'i zhal dang po ni dmar po //
translated: Her first face is red,

original: g-yas pa ni dkar po /
analyzed: g-yas pa ni dkar po /
translated: The right is white.

original: g-yon pa nag po'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa nag po'o //
translated: The left is black.

original: phyag g-yas kyi dang por chu skyes kyi steng na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po tis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas kyi dang por chu skyes kyi steng na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po tis mtshan pa'o //
translated: In the first right hand, on a lotus, is a book marked with the perfection of wisdom.

original: gnyis pa na ral gri /
analyzed: gnyis pa na ral gri /
translated: In the second is a sword.

original: gsum pa na gri gug g-yon gyi phyag dang po na 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa /
analyzed: gsum pa na gri gug g-yon gyi phyag dang po na 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa /
translated: In the third is a flaying knife. In the first left hand is a white eight-spoked wheel.

original: gnyis pa na pi wang rin po che /
analyzed: gnyis pa na pi wang rin po che /
translated: In the second is a jeweled lute.

original: gsum pa na tshangs pa'i mgo'o //
analyzed: gsum pa na tshangs pa'i mgo'o //
translated: In the third is a Brahma head.

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar lha mo bskyed nas /
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar lha mo bskyed nas /
translated: Just as the goddess is generated at the end of the emptiness meditative stabilization,

original: sa bon las de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das ma snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sa bon las de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das ma snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: in the same way, the Bhagavatī is to be meditated on at the heart.

original: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs te /
analyzed: de nas sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs te /
translated: Then, the awareness being is invited by light rays arising from the seed syllable.

original: mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make offerings.

original: 'jug par 'dod na de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug par 'dod na de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to enter, then one should recite the mantra.

original: sngags pas yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas /
analyzed: sngags pas yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas /
translated: The mantrin, having equipoised mental meditative stabilization,

original: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas nas de nas bya ba rtsom mo //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas nas de nas bya ba rtsom mo //
translated: Having recited it two hundred thousand times, one should then undertake the rite.

original: de la sngags ni 'di'o //
analyzed: de la sngags ni 'di'o //
translated: The mantra is:

original: aom pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva la /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pradzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva la /
translated: Oṃ picu prajñāvardhani jvala jvala

original: me dha bardha ni /
analyzed: me dha bardha ni /
translated: medhāvardhani

original: dhi ri dhi ri bu dhi bardha ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dhi ri dhi ri bu dhi bardha ni sv'a h'a /
translated: dhi ri dhi ri buddhivardhani svāhā.

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba'i snang ba la legs par sbyar ba brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba'i snang ba la legs par sbyar ba brtsam par bya'o //
translated: Beginning on the first day of the bright fortnight, one should undertake the rite in the light of the moon.

original: ji srid zla ba ma nub kyi bar du ste /
analyzed: ji srid zla ba ma nub kyi bar du ste /
translated: One should recite the mantra until the moon sets.

original: ji srid zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i nyin par nya la zla ba gang ba ji srid pa de srid du bzlas shing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i nyin par nya la zla ba gang ba ji srid pa de srid du bzlas shing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should recite and meditate for as long as the moon is full on the full moon day.

original: de nas sngar ma thos pa'i bstan bcos kyang mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas sngar ma thos pa'i bstan bcos kyang mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, even treatises not previously studied will become manifest.

original: nyi ma re re zhing gzhung stong phrag re 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma re re zhing gzhung stong phrag re 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will retain a thousand texts every day.

original: rgol ba thams cad 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: rgol ba thams cad 'joms par byed do //
translated: One will defeat all adversaries.

original: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be loved by gods and humans.

original: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las phyung ba rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las phyung ba rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The Vajra Sarasvatī Sādhana Extracted from the Black Yamāri Tantra is complete.
